mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gstore (goods_name, goods_brand, goods_price, goods_quantity, goods_tag, goods_image, goods_info) VALUES (#{goodsName}, #{goodsBrand}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsQuantity}, #{goodsTag}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsInfo})
mapper.update: UPDATE gstore SET goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_brand = #{goodsBrand}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, goods_quantity = #{goodsQuantity}, goods_tag = #{goodsTag}, goods_image = #{goodsImage}, goods_info = #{goodsInfo} WHERE goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM gstore WHERE top_rank IN (1,2,3) ORDER BY top_rank
mapper.update: UPDATE gstore SET top_rank = CASE goods_id WHEN #{top1} THEN 1 WHEN #{top2} THEN 2 WHEN #{top3} THEN 3 ELSE 0 END WHERE goods_id IN (#{top1}, #{top2}, #{top3}) OR top_rank IN (1,2,3)
